channel.title: Ph.D Success on ARG@ENU
channel.description: Recent content in Ph.D Success on ARG@ENU

item.title: Dr Dana Khartabil
item.description: Some good news to round out the week. Iâ€™m delighted to announce that my Ph.D student, Dana Khartabil, successfully made a defence of her PhD thesis, “Visualisation Techniques to Facilitate Argument Exploration”, this morning and will be awarded her PhD subject to minor corrections. Thank you to Professor Emma Hart in the twin roles of both panel and viva chair. Thanks also to Professor Jon Kerridge, who served as internal examiner.
